List of all members
Dfs< GR, TR >::SetStandardProcessedMap Struct Reference

Detailed Description

template<typename GR, typename TR>
struct lemon::Dfs< GR, TR >::SetStandardProcessedMap

Named parameter for setting ProcessedMap type to be Digraph::NodeMap<bool>. If you don't set it explicitly, it will be automatically allocated.

#include <lemon/dfs.h>

Inheritance diagram for Dfs< GR, TR >::SetStandardProcessedMap:
